entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries and rain showers near midnight. Snow level 1700 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries or rain showers. High 10.
entry.summary: A few flurries and rain showers ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023
